channel.title: Comments on: Mood Fitting Songs (#1, I Guess)
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Hehe.... I guess I should post more of these so that you'll come to the Israeli Prodigy show, if and when they come here :)
item.content:encoded: Hehe…. I guess I should post more of these so that you’ll come to the Israeli Prodigy show, if and when they come here :)

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
Is that the mood for shity songs?
I even like out-of-space better than this one :)
item.content:encoded:
